item.title: TikTok 提供了为美国生命辩护的最后机会
item.description: 在美国，TikTok 在为生存而战的第 11 个小时取得了胜利。但首先...【原文：TikTok notched an 11th-hour win in its fight to stay alive in the US. But first...】

item.title: 鲍威尔认为美联储将进入新阶段，重心将回到通胀问题上
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们关注美联储的新政策阶段。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at the Fed’s new policy phase. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 世贸组织年终显示瘫痪多于进步
item.description: 世界贸易组织本周举行了其 2024 年会议的最后一次会议，对于任何希望该机构在其成立 30 周年之前达成讨论已久的协议的人来说，会议结果都有点难以接受。【原文：The World Trade Organization held the last of its 2024 meetings this week, and for anyone rooting for the institution to conclude long-discussed agreements just ahead of its 30th anniversary, the results were a little hard to watch.】

item.title: 低垂的果实 "已不复存在，人工智能巨头寻求新策略
item.description:
最先进的新型人工智能系统的进展速度低于预期。【原文：

Progress on the most advanced new AI systems has been slower than expected.

】

item.title: 英国央行坚持宽松计划，三位官员支持降息
item.description: 英国央行表示将在 2025 年继续逐步放宽政策，因为越来越多的官员抛开了通胀持续存在的证据，支持立即削减借贷成本。【原文：The Bank of England signaled it will keep easing gradually in 2025 as a growing minority of officials set aside evidence of lingering inflation to back an immediate cut in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 英国石油公司与伊拉克推进基尔库克油气田再开发项目
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）周四表示，该公司与伊拉克政府就重新开发多产的基尔库克油气田的技术条款达成了协议。【原文：BP Plc reached an agreement with the Iraqi government on technical terms to redevelop the prolific Kirkuk oil and gas fields, the company said Thursday.】

item.title: 法国将在没有预算的情况下推进 3,000 亿欧元债券计划
item.description: 法国政府本月初下台后，法国债务机构一直在等待新的预算，因此其 2025 年的发行计划与最初的目标保持不变。【原文：France’s debt agency kept its issuance plans for 2025 unchanged from an initial target as it awaits a new budget following the ouster of the government earlier this month.】

item.title: 鲍威尔的讲话给股票牛市带来阴霾
item.description: 无论杰罗姆-鲍威尔是否有意传达这一信息，投资者都从美联储主席昨天的演讲中得到了一点启示：过去两年多的高歌猛进、风险至上的涨势突然岌岌可危。【原文：Whether Jerome Powell intended to convey the message or not, investors took one thing away from the Fed chair’s presentation yesterday: The go-go, risk-on rally of the past two-plus years is suddenly in peril.】

item.title: 美联储释放鹰派利率前景信号，亚洲货币下滑
item.description: 由于美联储下调了降息前景，亚洲货币承压。【原文：Asian currencies have come under pressure as the Federal Reserve reduced its outlook for interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 航运业 1880 亿美元的狂飙削减了制造新船的空间
item.description: 自全球金融危机爆发以来最大规模的船舶订购计划正在挤压造船业建造新船的能力。【原文：The biggest vessel-ordering program since the eve of the global financial crisis is putting a squeeze on the shipbuilding industry’s capacity to construct new vessels.】

item.title: 巴西央行上调经济增长预测，经济趋缓
item.description: 巴西央行上调了今明两年的经济增长预期，决策者承诺提高利率以抑制经济活动过热带来的通胀压力。【原文：Brazil’s central bank lifted its economic growth forecasts for this year and next as policymakers pledge higher interest rates to tame inflationary pressures from overheated activity.】

item.title: 欧盟领导人将在布鲁塞尔与泽连斯基讨论天然气过境问题
item.description: 欧盟领导人将在布鲁塞尔与乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基讨论俄罗斯通过乌克兰转运天然气等问题。【原文：European Union leaders are set to discuss Russian gas transit through Ukraine, among other topics, with President Volodymyr Zelenskiy in Brussels.】

item.title: 耐克首席执行官首次推销其 "酷 "计划
item.description: 耐克公司（Nike Inc.首席执行官埃利奥特-希尔（Elliott Hill）即将面对他自今年 9 月上任以来的首次财报电话会议，华尔街对此有很多疑问。【原文：Nike Inc. Chief Executive Officer Elliott Hill is about to face his first earnings call since accepting the top job in September, and Wall Street has plenty of questions.】

item.title: 南非公用事业公司 Eskom 预测自 2017 年以来首次盈利
item.description: 南非电力公用事业公司 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. 预测，自 2017 年以来将首次恢复盈利，尽管该公司上一财年的亏损大幅增加。【原文：South African power utility Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. forecast a return to profit for the first time since 2017, even as it recorded a sharp increase in losses for the last financial year.】

item.title: 法国 Meridiam 公司收购希腊与塞浦路斯、以色列的电力联系
item.description: 熟悉该交易的人士称，Meridiam SAS 同意购买希腊 19 亿欧元（19.8 亿美元）项目的股份，该项目旨在通过横跨东地中海的海底电缆将希腊电网与塞浦路斯和以色列连接起来。【原文：Meridiam SAS agreed to buy a stake in Greece’s €1.9 billion ($1.98 billion) project to link its power grid with Cyprus and Israel through undersea cables across the eastern Mediterranean, people familiar with the deal said.】

item.title: 拉脱维亚任命副行长卡利斯为临时央行行长
item.description: 拉脱维亚议会将央行的临时控制权授予了行长马丁斯-卡扎克斯（Martins Kazaks）的一名副手，后者的任期将于 12 月 21 日结束。【原文：Latvia’s parliament granted temporary control over the central bank to a deputy of Governor Martins Kazaks, whose term ends on Dec. 21.】

item.title: 香港寻求放宽 IPO 要求以重拾光彩
item.description: 在中国股市面临挑战的环境之后，香港正在努力整顿股市，而此时香港的证券交易所正寻求放宽首次公开募股的一些要求。【原文：Hong Kong’s stock exchange is seeking to relax some requirements for initial public offerings, at a time when the city is trying to revamp its stock market after a challenging environment for Chinese shares.】

item.title: Adnoc 将化工企业 Covestro 视为独立的增长型业务
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. plans to keep Covestro AG, the German chemical maker it’s taking over, as a standalone business.】

item.title: Bill Hwang重返法庭，争取减少刑期
item.description: 在被判处 18 年监禁数周后，Archegos 资本管理公司创始人黄标（Bill Hwang）将再次出庭，以证明其中三分之一的时间应在自己家中度过。【原文：Weeks after he was given an 18-year prison sentence, Archegos Capital Management founder Bill Hwang is due back in court to make the case that a third of that time should be spent in the comfort of his own home.】

item.title: SK 海力士完成 9.58 亿美元美国芯片赠款和贷款交易
item.description: 拜登政府已达成协议，向 SK Hynix 公司提供高达 4.58 亿美元的赠款和 5 亿美元的贷款，以支持其在印第安纳州的先进芯片封装工厂，这是美国努力建立国内半导体供应链的关键部分。【原文：The Biden administration has cemented a deal to give SK Hynix Inc. as much as $458 million in grants and $500 million in loans to support an advanced chip packaging facility in Indiana, a key part of US efforts to build a domestic semiconductor supply chain.】

item.title: 卢拉的助手无能为力，任由货币恐慌在巴西蔓延
item.description: 随着巴西货币暴跌，该国市场多年来首次成为国际焦点，路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统的高级经济助手们正在面临一个严峻的现实。他们担心，自己无力阻止恐慌。【原文：As the currency craters in Brazil, thrusting the country’s markets into the international spotlight for the first time in years, a grim reality is setting in for top economic aides to President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva. They are, they fear, powerless to do much to stop the panic.】

item.title: 中国航空公司以 119 亿美元订购空客和波音飞机
item.description: 台湾中华航空有限公司（China Airlines Ltd.）将订购二十多架波音公司和空中客车公司（Airbus SE）的远程客机和货运飞机，以更新其老旧机队。【原文：Taiwan’s China Airlines Ltd. will order two dozen Boeing Co. and Airbus SE long-range passenger and air cargo jets as it seeks to renew its fleet of older planes.】

item.title: 印尼考虑大幅削减镍矿开采以提振价格
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度尼西亚正在考虑大幅削减镍矿开采配额，以提振下滑的电池金属价格。【原文：Indonesia is considering deep cuts to nickel mining quotas as it seeks to boost slumping prices of the battery metal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易员怀疑英国央行是否会在二月降息
item.description: 投资者减少了对英国央行进一步降息的押注，市场认为 2 月份降息四分之一个点的可能性仅为 50%。【原文：Investors pared bets on further interest-rate cuts from the Bank of England, with the market assigning just a 50% chance of a quarter-point cut in February.】

item.title: 韩国承诺出资 380 亿美元加强关键供应链
item.description: 韩国已承诺在未来三年斥资 55 万亿韩元（约合 380 亿美元），以加强该国关键矿产和关键产业（如电动汽车和电池制造）所需零部件的供应链。【原文：South Korea has pledged to spend 55 trillion won ($38 billion) over the next three years to shore up the nation’s supply chain for critical minerals and the components needed for key industries, like electric vehicles and battery making.】

item.title: 乐天化学因债权人支持修改盟约而避免违约
item.description: 乐天化学公司（Lotte Chemical Corp.）的债券持有人批准取消该公司债务中的一项契约条款，从而使韩国最大企业集团之一的核心部分避免了可能的违约。【原文：Bondholders of Lotte Chemical Corp. approved removing a covenant clause from the company’s debt, allowing a core part of one of South Korea’s largest conglomerates avoid a possible default.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚为被控贪污者提供 "悔过机会
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托向那些被指控腐败的人提出了一个非常规的交易：归还被盗的国有资产，即使是悄悄地归还，也可以得到宽恕。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto offered an unconventional deal to those accused of corruption: return stolen state assets — even quietly — and you may be forgiven.】

item.title: 西姆库斯称欧洲央行应保持一致的降息步伐
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员吉迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）认为，随着通胀日益受到控制，欧洲中央银行应继续以目前的速度降低借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank should keep lowering borrowing costs at the current pace as inflation is increasingly under control, according to Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus.】

item.title: 挪威维持利率稳定并发出三月首次降息的信号
item.description: 挪威央行将借贷成本维持在16年来的高位不变，并表示很有可能在2025年3月降低关键利率。【原文：Norway’s central bank held its borrowing costs unchanged at a 16-year high and said the key rate will most likely be reduced in March 2025.】

item.title: 妮娜-阿查吉安谈当前在风险投资领域取胜的关键所在
item.description:
如何在不断变化的市场中取得成功。【原文：

How to succeed in a changing market.

】
